A4.text: The Eagles went on to win 41–33, capturing their first Super Bowl Vince Lombardi Trophy in franchise history.

A5.text: The Eagles ultimately lost to the Chiefs by a score of 38–35.

A6.text: The Eagles' victory in Super Bowl LII made the NFC East the first division to have each team win at least one Super Bowl.

A7.text: It was the Eagles' third Super Bowl appearance and their first win in franchise history.

A8.text: They also appeared in and lost Super Bowl LII to the Philadelphia Eagles following the 2017 season, giving them four Super Bowl appearances in five years and putting them one win away from three consecutive Super Bowl titles.

A9.text: The Eagles won Super Bowl LIX, the team's most recent Super Bowl appearance.
